event_data.play: Deploy Infrastructure with Docker Containers for Edge and Origin Servers
event_data.task: Configure network interfaces and veth pairs

results.stderr:
+ echo sh_ja_container1
+ cut -c1-8
+ short_name_prefix=sh_ja_co
+ echo sh_ja_container1
+ rev
+ cut -c1-2
+ rev
+ short_name_suffix=r1
+ short_name=sh_ja_co_r1
+ ip link add sh_ja_co_r1 type veth peer name v_sh_ja_co_r1
+ ip link set v_sh_ja_co_r1 up
+ ip link set v_sh_ja_co_r1 master sh_ja_S1_br
+ ip link set sh_ja_co_r1 netns sh_ja_container1
+ ip netns exec sh_ja_container1 ip link set sh_ja_co_r1 up
+ docker exec sh_ja_container1 dhclient sh_ja_co_r1
results.cmd:
set -x
short_name_prefix="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | cut -c1-8)"
short_name_suffix="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
short_name="${short_name_prefix}_${short_name_suffix}"
#short_name="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | cut -c1-8)_$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
# Create veth pair for bridge
ip link add ${short_name} type veth peer name v_${short_name}
# Bring up veth peer in host namespace for bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} up
# Attach veth interface to the bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} master sh_ja_S1_br
# Assign container network interface to veth
ip link set ${short_name} netns 'sh_ja_container1'
# Bring up container network interface in container namespace for bridge
ip netns exec 'sh_ja_container1' ip link set ${short_name} up
# Start dhclient on container interface (Optional based on setup)
docker exec 'sh_ja_container1' dhclient ${short_name}

module_args._raw_params:
set -x
short_name_prefix="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | cut -c1-8)"
short_name_suffix="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
short_name="${short_name_prefix}_${short_name_suffix}"
#short_name="$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | cut -c1-8)_$(echo 'sh_ja_container1' | rev | cut -c1-2 | rev)"
# Create veth pair for bridge
ip link add ${short_name} type veth peer name v_${short_name}
# Bring up veth peer in host namespace for bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} up
# Attach veth interface to the bridge
ip link set v_${short_name} master sh_ja_S1_br
# Assign container network interface to veth
ip link set ${short_name} netns 'sh_ja_container1'
# Bring up container network interface in container namespace for bridge
ip netns exec 'sh_ja_container1' ip link set ${short_name} up
# Start dhclient on container interface (Optional based on setup)
docker exec 'sh_ja_container1' dhclient ${short_name}

stderr_lines: + ip link add sh_ja_co_r1 type veth peer name v_sh_ja_co_r1
+ ip link set v_sh_ja_co_r1 master sh_ja_S1_br
+ ip link set sh_ja_co_r1 netns sh_ja_container1
+ ip netns exec sh_ja_container1 ip link set sh_ja_co_r1 up
